<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shooter's Camouflage](/Feats.aspx?ID=3195) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

You specialize in blending into a particular type of environment, able to disappear after taking your shot. Choose either natural or urban terrain. In the chosen terrain, you can [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) and [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) even without cover or being [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4).
name: Shooter's Camouflage
